response.original_title: 無断でイッたら罰金。悶絶レズエステ　乙アリス×鈴音杏夏
response.overview: "If you orgasm, it's 100,000 yen. If you orgasm without permission, it's 200,000 yen..." They enjoy the lewd reactions of a young woman, cornering her resisting mind and body to make the straight beauty fall into lesbian pleasure... This is the reality of a corrupt spa that "eats" straight women, preying on the trust they place thinking "it's okay because we're both women," to corner their young bodies with a borderline and obscene treatment. They make her sign a consent form without her knowing it's a trap! With a pleasure treatment by two therapists who know the "woman's pressure points" inside and out, they continue to make her cum without stopping as her body writhes in shame and pleasure. In a fainting, borderline pleasure spa where they don't stop even after she orgasms, she is turned into an obedient lesbian submissive...
